mapper.select: SELECT c.cid AS cid, c.userid AS userid, p.pid AS pid, u.username AS username, p.productname AS productname, c. cartqty, p. price AS price, (price * cartqty) totalprice FROM USER_T u, PRODUCT_T p, CART_T c WHERE u.userid = c.userid AND p.pid = c.pid AND c.userid = #{userid} ORDER BY c.cid
